item.title: 联合爱迪生公司第二季度利润超出预期
item.description: 电力和天然气公用事业公司联合爱迪生公司（Consolidated Edison）周四公布的第二季度利润超出预期，原因是天气炎热，用户纷纷打开空调和冰箱。【原文：Electric and gas utility Consolidated Edison beat second-quarter profit estimates on Thursday, as customers cranked up air conditioners and refrigerators during hotter weather.】

item.title: 沃尔格林以约 11 亿美元出售 Cencora 股份
item.description: 沃尔格林博姿联盟（Walgreens Boots Alliance）周四表示，已出售药品分销商 Cencora 的股票，收益约为 11 亿美元。【原文：Walgreens Boots Alliance said on Thursday it has sold shares for proceeds of about $1.1 billion in drug distributor Cencora .】

item.title: 软件需求强劲，Avast 杀毒软件所有者 Gen 预测季度收入强劲
item.description: 网络安全公司 Gen Digital 周四预测第二季度收入将高于华尔街预期，这表明客户将增加防病毒解决方案的支出，以保护他们的系统免受数字威胁。【原文：Cybersecurity firm Gen Digital forecast second-quarter revenue above Wall Street estimates on Thursday, a sign that customers will increase spending on antivirus solutions to safeguard their systems from digital threats.】

item.title: 工会称必和必拓智利埃斯孔迪达矿工人拒绝接受合同报价
item.description: 必和必拓（BHP）工会周四表示，世界最大铜矿埃斯孔迪达（Escondida）铜矿的工人拒绝了新的集体谈判协议，为可能的罢工埋下了伏笔。【原文：Workers at BHP's Escondida, the world's largest copper mine, rejected an offer for a new collective bargaining agreement, setting the stage for a potential strike, the union said on Thursday.】

item.title: 早间竞价：对经济增长的担忧令收益率下滑，市场萎靡不振
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 富国银行因反洗钱和制裁问题面临政府调查
item.description: 富国银行（Wells Fargo）周四在一份文件中表示，政府当局正在对其反洗钱和制裁计划中存在的问题进行调查。【原文：Wells Fargo is being investigated by government authorities over issues in its anti-money laundering and sanctions programs, the bank said on Thursday in a filing.】

item.title: 股市重拾跌势，华尔街 "恐惧指数 "跃升至三个月新高
item.description: 华尔街最受关注的投资者焦虑指数周四跃升至三个多月来的新高，因为美国股市在周四的一轮数据刺激人们担心经济放缓的速度可能快于预期后大幅下跌。【原文：Wall Street's most watched gauge of investor anxiety jumped to a more than three-month high on Thursday as U.S. stocks fell sharply after a round of data on Thursday spurred concerns the economy may be slowing faster than anticipated.】

item.title: Booking 预计客房间夜数增长放缓，股价下跌
item.description: 在线旅行社 Booking Holdings 在第二季度营收和利润超出分析师预期后，预计第三季度客房间夜数增长将有所下降，盘后股价下跌 8%。【原文：Online travel agency Booking Holdings forecast lower room nights growth in the third quarter after beating analysts' estimates for second-quarter revenue and profit, sending its shares down 8% after the bell.】

item.title: 由于安全服务需求强劲，摩托罗拉解决方案将年度收入和利润上调至高于预期的水平
item.description: 摩托罗拉解决方案公司（Motorola Solutions）周四上调了全年营收和利润预期，季度业绩优于预期，原因是该公司的安全和企业安全服务需求强劲。 摩托罗拉向政府和私营实体提供公共安全解决方案，以缩短紧急情况下的反应时间，并堵塞安全漏洞。【原文：Motorola Solutions raised its full-year revenue and profit forecast and beat quarterly results on Thursday, as it sees robust demand for its safety and enterprise security services. Motorola provides public safety solutions to governments and private entities for shortening response times in emergencies and also to plug security holes.】

item.title: 美国法院阻止拜登政府制定网络中立规则
item.description: 美国一家上诉法院周四阻止联邦通信委员会恢复具有里程碑意义的网络中立规则，称宽带提供商很可能在法律挑战中胜诉。【原文：A U.S. appeals court on Thursday blocked the Federal Communications Commission's reinstatement of landmark net neutrality rules, saying broadband providers are likely to succeed in a legal challenge.】

item.title: 反应：华尔街在早盘反弹转为风险厌恶走势后下滑
item.description: 周四晚些时候，美国 500 指数下跌超过 2%，纳斯达克指数一度下跌超过 3%，扭转了早盘的涨势，8 月份首个交易日收盘大幅下跌，此前的数据引发了市场对美联储维持限制性货币政策导致经济可能过快放缓的担忧。【原文：The S&P 500 fell more than 2% and the Nasdaq more than 3% at one point late on Thursday, reversing early gains and closing the first session of August sharply lower after data spurred concerns the economy may be slowing too fast as the Federal Reserve maintains a restrictive monetary policy.】

item.title: 保诚金融调整后的第二季度利润因美国业务部门的强劲表现而增长
item.description: 保险商保诚金融公司周四公布第二季度调整后利润增长，其美国部门因承保能力增强和投资回报增加而受到提振。【原文：Insurer Prudential Financial reported a rise in second-quarter adjusted profit on Thursday, as its U.S. unit was boosted by stronger underwriting and higher investment returns.】

item.title: 美国在最新调查中将飙升的杂货价格作为目标
item.description: 美国联邦贸易委员会主席莉娜-汗（Lina Khan）周四表示，美国联邦贸易委员会将调查为何在零售商成本下降的情况下食品杂货价格仍然居高不下，这也是拜登-哈里斯政府在总统大选即将到来之际的一个重要主题。【原文：The U.S. Federal Trade Commission will probe why grocery prices remain high even as costs for retailers fall, Chair Lina Khan said on Thursday, a key theme for the Biden-Harris administration as it heads towards the presidential election.】

item.title: 天然气价格疲软，Coterra Energy 盈利不及预期
item.description: 受天然气价格低迷的影响，美国石油和天然气生产商科特拉能源公司（Coterra Energy）周四公布的第二季度利润不及分析师预期。【原文：U.S. oil and gas producer Coterra Energy missed analysts' estimates for second-quarter profit on Thursday, hurt by subdued natural gas prices.】

item.title: 布洛克公司因支出强劲而上调核心盈利预期，并加大回购力度
item.description: 周四，支付公司布洛克（Block）上调了年度调整后核心盈利预期，并加强了股票回购计划，押注于消费支出的恢复性增长，盘后股价上涨 7.4%。【原文：Payments firm Block raised its forecast for annual adjusted core earnings on Thursday and boosted its share buyback program, betting on resilient consumer spending and sending its shares up 7.4% after the bell.】

item.title: iPhone 销量超出预期，苹果公司收入恢复增长
item.description: 苹果公司周四公布第三财季销售额恢复增长，iPhone 收入超过华尔街目标，帮助缓解了主要市场中国销售额超预期下滑的影响。【原文：Apple on Thursday reported a return to sales growth in its fiscal third quarter as iPhone revenue topped Wall Street targets, helping cushion a bigger-than-expected sales decline in major market China.】

item.title: 高乐氏预计全年利润高于预期，第四季度利润因投入成本降低而超出预期
item.description: 漂白剂生产商高乐氏（Clorox）周四公布的第四季度利润超过预期，预计全年利润将超过预期，这主要得益于其家庭护理产品的连续涨价以及投入成本的降低提高了利润率。【原文：Bleach maker Clorox forecast annual profit above estimates after beating fourth-quarter profit on Thursday, banking on consecutive price hikes of its home care products and easing input costs that improved margins.】

item.title: 预算官员表示，加拿大的资本利得税目标还差 20 亿加元
item.description: 据加拿大国会预算官员周四发布的一份分析报告称，加拿大联邦政府在未来五年内提高其备受争议的资本利得税的目标将落空十分之一。【原文：Canadian federal government's target for a bump in its controversial capital gains tax over the next five years will fall short by a tenth, according to an analysis released on Thursday by the parliamentary budget officer.】

item.title: 西方石油公司完成价值 120 亿美元的 CrownRock 交易
item.description: 西方石油公司（Occidental Petroleum）周四表示，该公司已经完成了以 120 亿美元收购皇冠岩石公司（CrownRock）的交易。【原文：Occidental Petroleum said on Thursday it has closed its $12 billion deal to buy CrownRock.】

item.title: MercadoLibre 第二季度净利润增长一倍多，超出预期
item.description: 拉丁美洲电子商务巨头 MercadoLibre 周四表示，其第二季度净利润比去年同期增长了一倍多，超过了分析师的预期。【原文：Latin America e-commerce giant MercadoLibre said on Thursday its net profit more than doubled in the second quarter from a year earlier, beating analysts estimates.】

item.title: 广告业务强劲，Roku 季度收入超出预期
item.description: 受惠于强劲的广告销售以及从有线电视向流媒体平台的持续转移，Roku 周四公布的第二季度营收超出华尔街预期。【原文：Roku beat Wall Street estimates for second-quarter revenue on Thursday, benefiting from strong ad sales and the ongoing shift from cable TV to streaming platforms.】

item.title: 稀土价格下滑导致 MP 材料公司出现季度亏损
item.description: 美国稀土生产商 MP Materials 公司周四表示，由于战略矿物价格下跌和运营挑战，该公司第二季度出现亏损。【原文：U.S. rare earths producer MP Materials said on Thursday it swung to a loss in the second quarter due to falling prices for the strategic minerals and operational challenges.】

item.title: 加密货币交易复苏，Coinbase 第二季度收入激增
item.description: 周四，Coinbase 公布第二季度收入激增，原因是市场对监管路障放宽的欣喜情绪使加密货币交易所的交易量恢复了活力。【原文：Coinbase reported a surge in second-quarter revenue on Thursday as trading volumes at the crypto exchange roared back to life thanks to market euphoria over easing regulatory roadblocks.】

item.title: 竞争加剧，Snap 预测收入下滑，股价下跌
item.description: 本周四，Snap 预测本季度销售额和调整后核心盈利低于市场预期，因为 Snapchat 的所有者正努力应对在不确定的经济形势下来自大型竞争对手争夺广告资金的激烈竞争。【原文：Snap forecast current-quarter sales and adjusted core earnings below market expectations on Thursday as the Snapchat owner grapples with stiff competition from larger rivals for advertising dollars in an uncertain economy.】

item.title: 囊性纤维化治疗需求强劲，Vertex 制药公司上调年度收入预期
item.description: Vertex Pharmaceuticals 公司周四上调了年度收入预期，看好囊性纤维化（CF）治疗的强劲需求。【原文：Vertex Pharmaceuticals raised its annual revenue forecast on Thursday, betting on robust demand for its cystic fibrosis (CF) treatments.】

item.title: DoorDash 预计第三季度核心利润增长，在线订餐保持弹性
item.description: 由于越来越多的客户使用其在线外卖平台订购食品和杂货，DoorDash 周四预计第三季度核心利润将超过预期，6 月份的收入也将超过预期，这使得其股价在盘后交易中上涨了约 15%。【原文：DoorDash forecast third-quarter core profit above expectations and surpassed revenue estimates for the June quarter on Thursday, as more customers used its online delivery platform to order food and grocery items, sending its shares up about 15% in extended trading.】

item.title: 亚马逊预计季度营收低于预期，股价下滑
item.description: 亚马逊公司预计本季度销售额低于预期，尽管第二季度利润超过华尔街预期，但盘后股价仍大幅下跌。【原文：Amazon.com forecast current quarter sales below estimates, and shares fell sharply after hours even though second-quarter profit beat Wall Street estimates.】

item.title: 英特尔将裁员 15%，暂停派息以推动扭亏为盈
item.description: 英特尔公司周四表示，将裁员 15%，并将在第四季度暂停派息，因为这家芯片制造商正围绕亏损的制造业务寻求扭亏为盈。【原文：Intel said on Thursday it would cut 15% of its workforce and will suspend its dividend in the fourth quarter as the chipmaker pursues a turnaround centered around its loss-making manufacturing business.】

item.title: 芯片指数暴跌 8%，Arm 戳破人工智能乐观情绪
item.description: 美国芯片股周四大幅下挫，有望创下自 2020 年以来最糟糕的一天，原因是 Arm Holdings 的保守预测打击了投资者对人工智能的乐观情绪，而且数据显示经济正在降温。【原文：U.S. chip stocks plummeted on Thursday, on track for their worst day since 2020, after a conservative forecast from Arm Holdings dampened investor optimism about artificial intelligence and data signaled a cooling economy.】

item.title: 独家报道：通用汽车通过新的评级系统提高员工绩效标准
item.description: 通用汽车公司（General Motors）正在改变其对美国受薪员工绩效的评级方式，以更好地奖励绩效高的员工，并对绩效低的员工施加压力，迫使其改进工作或离职。【原文：General Motors is changing the way it rates the performance of its salaried employees in the U.S. in a move to better reward high-performers and put pressure on low-performers to improve or leave.】
